properties.title: GRID3 SLE - Settlement Names v1.0
properties.description: The data are provided in geodatabase file formats. File name: GRID3_SLE_settlement_names_v1.0.gdb with the following layers: GRID3_SLE_settlement_names_v1.0 codebook_settlement_names Extent: Sierra Leone Coordinate system: GCS WGS 1984 For full methodological details, please see data release notes available for download here . Download the data as a zip file . Dataset citation: Center for International Earth Science Information Network (CIESIN), Columbia University, Statistics Sierra Leone, and Sierra Leone Ministry of Basic and Senior Secondary Education. 2023. GRID3 SLE - Settlement Names v1. 0. New York: Geo-Referenced Infrastructure and Demographic Data for Development (GRID3). https://doi.org/10.7916/bxa4-bv46. Accessed DAY MONTH YEAR
properties.purpose: The GRID3 SLE - Settlement Names v1.0 dataset consists of settlement points with name, and location in Sierra Leone.

providers.name: Center for International Earth Science Information Network (CIESIN)
